Name: Harold and Maude
Ingredients: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Balanced, complex and very, very serious.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2009 by Chase Mallen at Raines Law Rooms in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Harold and Maude contains 188 calories
